name: Festival of Water Lilies
description: The paddy fields of Malarikkal are all set to roll out the resplendent pink carpets of water lilies. It’s that time of the year when the eye-catching water lilies would bloom on the flooded paddy fields. The sight of thousands of dazzling lilies perched on dark green leaves floating on water is simply surreal. The water lilies are spread across 600 acres out of the 1,800 acres of paddy fields and the best time to soak in the beauty of these exotic flowers is during sun rise. Malarikal village situated in Kottayam district  in Kerala.
